import React from 'react' import Navbar from '../../components/Navbar' import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; function TicketDetails({user}) { let params = useParams() const [ticket, setTicket] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { fetch(`/ticket/details/${params.id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { console.log(data); setTicket(data) }) }, []) console.log(ticket.comments); return (
Ticket Details
  • Title: {ticket.title}
  • Description: {ticket.description}
  • Priority: {ticket.priority}
  • status: {ticket.status}
  • Type of Bug: {ticket.type_of}
Ticket Comments
    {ticket.comments?.map(c => { return(
  • {user.first_name} {c.message}
    • )})}
    Ticket History
  • Time created / updated :
  • Personel assigned :
  • Property :
) } export default TicketDetails
